description: Mobile techniques used by DualToy, ATT&CK software S0315 v1.1
name: DualToy (S0315)

techniques.comment: DualToy side loads malicious or risky apps to both Android and iOS devices via a USB connection.
DualToy collects the connected iOS device’s information including IMEI, IMSI, ICCID, serial number and phone number.
